channel.title: Server.class help
channel.description: :eek: hey now i need someone to help me create a server.class doc for the run client.bat because i have a runserver.bat one but that is for that one so i need someone to help me make one or someone to make one... please help me this is the last thing i need... :eek:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2008, 12:46:38 am[/size][hr]I need a reply ASAP and i mean ASAP!!!! i really need this done!!!

item.title: Server.class help
item.dc:creator: @Demonheadge Demonheadge
item.description:
@Demonheadge wrote:

well can someone help me then because when it comes up it says couldn’t find server.class file…

Read full topic

item.title: Server.class help
item.dc:creator: @bencorbett bencorbett
item.description:
@bencorbett wrote:

Presuming ‘run client.bat’ means you are trying to run your client, you shouldn’t need a server class.

But anyways, server.class is a java class file so you can’t edit them manually.
You need to edit server.java and then run your compiler.

Read full topic

item.description:
